title: [Discussion] What is the process of getting it?
content:
Do i have to fill any form for mrd scholarship or pay anything extra to be eligible for this scholarships, I have taken  through Mains

I already have a bank account will that suffice or i need a bank account in union bank how can I apply to pesu to open bank account in union bank behalf of me ?

comments.body:
You don't have to fill any application for getting it.
If you have got admitted through jee, then you don't have to pay any extra fees.
You must have a union Bank account in any branch of your choice(preferably pesit)
